definition: natural family planning in which ovulation is assumed to occur 14 days before the onset of a period (the fertile period would be assumed to extend from day 10 through day 18 of her cycle)
details:
noun
- natural family planning in which ovulation is assumed to occur 14 days before the onset of a period (the fertile period would be assumed to extend from day 10 through day 18 of her cycle)
= synonyms: rhythm method of birth control
- recurring at regular intervals
= synonyms: regular recurrence
- the arrangement of spoken words alternating stressed and unstressed elements
= example: the arrangement of spoken words alternating stressed and unstressed elements
= synonyms: speech rhythm
- the basic rhythmic unit in a piece of music
= example: the basic rhythmic unit in a piece of music
= synonyms: beat
- an interval during which a recurring sequence of events occurs
= synonyms: round, cycle
